nodes.name: Split In Batches - Process Individual Emails

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "emailId": "{{ $('Function - Parse AI Analysis').item.json.originalEmail.emailId }}",
  "threadId": "{{ $('Function - Parse AI Analysis').item.json.originalEmail.threadId }}",
  "importance": "{{ $('Function - Parse AI Analysis').item.json.importance }}",
  "scheduledTime": "{{ DateTime.now().plus({ days: $('Google Sheets - Log Email Activity').item.json.importance === 'high' ? 1 : 3 }).toISO() }}",
  "senderEmail": "{{ $('Function - Track Conversion').item.json.originalData.email.senderEmail }}",
  "followUpRecommendations": "{{ $('Function - Track Conversion').item.json.conversationContext.followUpRecommendations }}",
  "status": "pending",
  "createdAt": "{{ DateTime.now().toISO() }}"
}

parameters.content: ## Follow Up and Reminder System and Analytics

main.node: Split In Batches - Process Individual Emails
